channel.title: FAWN on my Blog site
channel.description: Recent content in FAWN on my Blog site

item.title: Fawn
item.description: we got the ftp files now we got the flag TASK 1 What does the 3-letter acronym FTP stand for? file transfer protocol Which port does the FTP service listen on usually? port 21 What acronym is used for the secure version of FTP? SFTP What is the command we can use to send an ICMP echo request to test our connection to the target? Ping From your scans, what version is FTP running on the target?
